description.brazilian: Derrote um oponente IA no Modo Exibição pela primeira vez
description.english: Defeat a COM opponent for the first time in Exhibition
description.french: Battez un adversaire IA pour la première fois en Exhibition
description.german: Besiege einen COM-Gegner in Exhibition zum ersten Mal
description.japanese: エキシビションでCOMに勝利する
description.schinese: 在表演赛中首次战胜COM对手
description.spanish: Derrota a un rival COM por primera vez en Exhibición.
description.tchinese: 在表演賽中首次擊敗 COM 對手

displayName.japanese: ガードレールからの奇襲

description.brazilian: Execute 3 mergulhos das grades de contenção usando a habilidade Ataque Guardrail Dive em uma partida
description.english: Using the Guardrail Dive Offense skill, land 3 dives from the guardrails in a match
description.french: Réussissez 3 plongeons depuis la barrière dans un match avec Attaque en Plongeant de la Barrière
description.german: Lande mithilfe des Guardrail-Dive-Offense-Skills in einem Match 3 Dives von den Guardrails
description.japanese: Guardrail Dive Offenseスキルを使い、ガードレールからのダイビング技を1試合で3回決めろ
description.schinese: 一场赛事中使用 3 次护栏跳水攻击技能
description.spanish: Usando la habilidad Guardrail Dive Offense, conecta 3 ataques en salto desde valla en un combate.
description.tchinese: 使用護欄俯衝攻擊技能，在一場比賽中從護欄俯衝 3 次

description.brazilian: Defenda um ataque de mergulho usando a habilidade Defesa Antiaérea
description.english: Using the Anti-Air Defense skill, catch a dive attack
description.french: En utilisant la compétence Défense Anti-Aérienne, saisissez une attaque en plongeon
description.german: Fange mithilfe des Anti-Air-Defense-Skills einen Dive-Angriff ab
description.japanese: Anti-Air Defenseスキルを使い、ダイビング技をキャッチしろ
description.schinese: 使用对空防御技能，成功防御一次跳水攻击
description.spanish: Atrapa con Defensa antiaérea a un rival mientras se está lanzando en plancha.
description.tchinese: 使用對空防禦技能，接下俯衝攻擊

description.brazilian: Faça uma recuperação depois de cair no chão 5 vezes usando a habilidade Kip-Up em uma partida
description.english: Using the Kip-Up skill, recover from the ground 5 times in a match
description.french: En utilisant la compétence Saut Carpé, remettez-vous debout 5 fois dans un match
description.german: Komme mithilfe des Kip-Up-Skills in einem Match 5 Mal vom Boden hoch
description.japanese: Kip-Upスキルを使い、ダウン状態から1試合で5回脱出しろ
description.schinese: 一场赛事中使用 5 次鲤鱼打挺技能成功起身
description.spanish: Levántate del suelo 5 veces en un combate con la habilidad Kip-up.
description.tchinese: 使用背撐起身技能，在一場比賽中從地面起身 5 次

description.brazilian: Vença uma partida usando a finalização do oponente com a habilidade Violação de Gimmick
description.english: Using the Gimmick Infringement skill, win a match using the opponent's finisher
description.french: En utilisant la compétence Violation de Gimmick, gagnez un match en utilisant le Finisher adverse
description.german: Gewinne ein Match, indem du mit dem Gimmick-Verletzungs-Skill den Finisher deines Gegners ausführst
description.japanese: Gimmick Infringementのスキルを使い相手のフィニッシャーで勝利しろ
description.schinese: 使用偷龙转凤技能，用对手的终结技赢得比赛
description.spanish: Emplea la habilidad Copia barata para ganar un combate usando el remate de un rival.
description.tchinese: 使用偷龍轉鳳技能，使用對手的終結技贏得一場比賽

description.brazilian: Ataque um oponente usando um taco com arame farpado em uma Partida Apagão no Modo Exibição
description.english: Attack an opponent using a barbed wire bat in a Lights Out Match in Exhibition
description.french: Attaquez un adversaire en utilisant une batte avec barbelé dans un Lights Out Match en Exhibition
description.german: Greife einen Gegner in einem Lights Out Match im Exhibition-Modus mit einem Stacheldraht-Schläger an
description.japanese: エキシビションのライツアウトマッチで相手を有刺鉄線バットで攻撃しろ
description.schinese: 在表演赛的熄灯赛中使用铁丝球棒攻击对手
description.spanish: Ataca a un rival con un bate con alambre de espino en un combate Lights Out de Exhibición.
description.tchinese: 在表演賽的熄燈賽中使用鐵絲球棒攻擊對手

description.brazilian: Dispare 3 explosões de corda em um oponente no Mata-mata com Arame Farpado Explosivo no M. Exibição
description.english: Trigger 3 rope explosions on an opponent during an Exploding Barbed Wire Death Match in Exhibition
description.french: Causez 3 explosions de cordes sur un adversaire en DM de Fil Barbelé Explosif en Exhibition
description.german: Löse in einem Exploding Barbed Wire Death Match im Exhibition-Modus 3 Seil-Explosionen aus
description.japanese: エキシビションの有刺鉄線爆破マッチで相手をロープに接触させて、3回爆発させろ
description.schinese: 在表演赛的铁丝网电流爆破死亡赛中 3 次触发围绳爆炸伤及对手
description.spanish: Usa 3 explosiones en las cuerdas en un rival en un Exploding Barbed Wire Death Match de Exhibición.
description.tchinese: 在表演賽的鐵絲網電流爆破死亡賽期間觸發 3 次繩索爆炸並傷害對手

description.brazilian: Crie um Lutador Personalizado e conclua Partidas Solo
description.english: Create a Custom Wrestler and complete a Singles Match using them
description.french: Créez un(e) Catcheur(/se) personnalisé(e) et terminez un match en simple en le/la jouant
description.german: Erstelle einen eigenen Wrestler und schließe ein Singles Match mit ihm ab

description.tchinese: 建立自訂競技場並使用該場地完成一場比賽

description.tchinese: 建立含有自訂摔角選手的自訂隊伍，並使用該隊伍完成雙打比賽

description.brazilian: Ganhe o título da partida no Modo Exibição e vença o cinturão de campeão contra IA
description.english: Hold a title match in Exhibition and win a belt from a COM champion
description.french: Jouez dans un match pour le titre en Exhibition et remportez une ceinture d'un champion IA

description.tchinese: 在表演賽中舉辦冠軍賽並贏得 COM 冠軍的腰帶

description.brazilian: Faça uma compra usando Moeda AEW
description.english: Make a purchase using AEW Cash

description.tchinese: 使用 AEW 貨幣購買物品

displayName.spanish: Hasta en el cielo de la boca

description.brazilian: Vença uma Partida Solo depois de acertar o oponente com um movimento exclusivo e uma finalização
description.english: Win a Singles Match after hitting the opponent with a signature and finisher
description.french: Gagnez un match en simple après avoir porté à l'adversaire un Signature Move et un Finisher
description.german: Gewinne ein Singles Match, nachdem du dem Gegner einen Signature und einen Finisher verpasst hast
description.japanese: シングルマッチで相手にシグニチャー・ムーブとフィニッシャー・ムーブを両方決めて勝利する
description.schinese: 使用绝技和终结技攻击对手，赢得一场单打赛事

description.tchinese: 利用招牌技與終結技擊中對手，贏得單打比賽

description.brazilian: Vença uma partida com um pinfall com as mãos no bolso usando a habilidade Sloth Style
description.english: Using the Sloth Style skill, win a match by pinfall with hands in pocket
description.french: Avec la compétence Style du Paresseux, gagnez un match par tombé avec les mains dans les poches
description.german: Gewinne mithilfe des Sloth-Style-Skills ein Match durch einen Pinfall mit den Händen in den Taschen
description.japanese: Sloth Styleスキルを使い、ポケットに手を入れたままピンで勝利しろ
description.schinese: 使用树懒式技能，手插口袋压制对手赢得赛事
description.spanish: Gana un combate por pinfall con las manos en los bolsillos empleando la habilidad Estilo perezoso.
description.tchinese: 使用「慵懶式」技能，手插口袋壓制對手獲勝

description.brazilian: Vença uma partida com um movimento de rolagem usando a habilidade Impulso Desesperado
description.english: Using the Desperation Impulse skill, win a match with a roll-through move
description.french: En utilisant la compétence Impulsion Désespérée, gagnez un match avec un tombé par roulade
description.german: Gewinne mithilfe des Desperation-Impuls-Skills ein Match durch einen Roll-Through-Move
description.japanese: Desperation Impulseの丸め込み技で勝利しろ！
description.schinese: 使用绝境反击技能，打出翻滚招式赢得赛事
description.spanish: Gana un combate girando sobre tu cuerpo usando Ímpetu desesperado.
description.tchinese: 使用「絕境反擊」技能，以翻滾動作贏得比賽

description.brazilian: Vença uma Partida com 4 com todos os oponentes IA na dificuldade Difícil ou superior no M. Exibição
description.english: Win a 4-Way Match with all COM opponents on Hard difficulty or higher in Exhibition
description.french: Gagnez un 4-Way Match uniquement contre des adversaires IA niveau Difficile ou plus élevé
description.german: Gewinne im Exhibition-Modus ein 4-Way Match, bei dem COM-Gegner auf schwer oder höher gestellt sind
description.japanese: エキシビションで難易度HARD以上で自分以外全員COMの4-Wayマッチに勝利する
description.schinese: 在表演赛中，赢得四重威胁赛，击败所有困难或更高难度的COM对手
description.spanish: Gana un combate de Exhibición a 4 bandas contra rivales COM en dificultad difícil o superior.
description.tchinese: 在表演賽中贏得全為 COM 對手的危機四伏賽，且對手難度為困難以上。

description.brazilian: Coloque 10 lutadores na corda mais alta em Partida Casino Battle Royale contra todos os oponentes IA
description.english: Put 10 wrestlers over the top rope in a Casino Battle Royale Match against all COM opponents
description.french: Lancez 10 catcheurs par-dessus la 3e corde en Casino Battle Royale Match uniquement contre des IA
description.german: Befördere in einem Casino Battle Royale Match gegen COM-Gegner 10 Wrestler über das oberste Seil
description.japanese: エキシビションの相手が全員COMのカジノバトルロイヤルで1試合中に10名をオーバーザトップロープさせろ
description.schinese: 在全COM对手的皇家赌场之战中，将 10 名摔角扔过上围绳
description.spanish: Lanza a 10 oponentes por la cuerda superior en un combate Casino Battle Royale contra rivales COM.
description.tchinese: 在全為 COM 對手的賭場大混戰比賽中，將 10 名摔角選手丟過上繩索

displayName.japanese: ベストバウト・オブザイヤー

description.german: Schließe mindestens 30 Herausforderungen ab

description.schinese: 完成至少 30 项挑战
description.spanish: Completa al menos 30 desafíos.
description.tchinese: 完成至少 30 項挑戰

displayName.japanese: 耐えられる者はいない
displayName.spanish: Todo el mundo se someterá a mí

description.brazilian: Derrote um oponente IA por submissão no Modo Exibição
description.english: Defeat a COM opponent by submission in Exhibition
description.french: Battez un adversaire IA par soumission en Exhibition
description.german: Besiege im Exhibition-Modus einen COM-Gegner durch Aufgabe
description.japanese: エキシビションでCOM相手にサブミッションで勝利する
description.schinese: 在表演赛中通过制服击败一名COM对手
description.spanish: Derrota por sumisión a un rival COM en Exhibición.
description.tchinese: 在表演賽中以制伏方式擊敗一名 COM 對手

description.brazilian: Derrote um oponente IA na dificuldade ELITE em uma Partida Solo no Modo Exibição
description.english: Defeat a COM opponent on ELITE difficulty in a Singles Match in Exhibition
description.french: Battez un adversaire IA en difficulté ÉLITE dans un match en simple en Exhibition
description.german: Besiege im Exhibition-Modus einen COM-Gegner auf dem Schwierigkeitsgrad Elite in einem Singles Match
description.japanese: エキシビションのシングルマッチで難易度ELITEのCOM相手に勝利する
description.schinese: 在表演赛的单打赛事中击败一名精英难度COM对手
description.spanish: Derrota a un rival COM en un combate individual en Exhibición en dificultad ÉLITE.
description.tchinese: 在表演賽中的單打比賽擊敗一名精英難度的 COM 對手

displayName.japanese: キング・オブ・ハーツ

description.brazilian: Conclua um total de 100 Partidas Solo no modo Exibição
description.english: Complete 100 total Singles matches in Exhibition
description.french: Terminez 100 matchs en simple en Exhibition
description.german: Schließe in Exhibition insgesamt 100 Singles Matches ab
description.japanese: エキジビションのシングルマッチを通算100試合最後までプレイする
description.schinese: 在表演赛中共完成 100 场单打赛事
description.spanish: Completa un total de 100 combates individuales de Exhibición.
description.tchinese: 在表演賽中完成 100 場單打比賽

description.brazilian: Ganhe simultaneamente 3 títulos em Road to Elite
description.english: Hold 3 titles simultaneously in Road to Elite
description.french: Détenez 3 titres à la fois dans Road to Elite
description.german: Halte in Road to Elite 3 Titel gleichzeitig
description.japanese: ROAD TO ELITEで同時に3つのタイトルを所持する
description.schinese: 在 Road To Elite 中同时拥有 3 项冠军头衔
description.spanish: Ostenta 3 títulos a la vez en Camino a la Élite.
description.tchinese: 在 Road to Elite 中同時擁有 3 個冠軍頭銜

description.brazilian: Empurre uma escada com um oponente para derrubá-lo em uma Partida de Escada
description.english: Push over a ladder an opponent is on to knock that opponent down in a Ladder Match
description.french: Poussez une échelle sur laquelle se trouve un adversaire pour le faire tomber dans un Ladder Match
description.german: Stoße eine Leiter um, auf der ein Gegner steht, um ihn zu Boden zu bringen
description.japanese: ラダーマッチで、ラダーを押し倒して、相手をラダーから落下させろ！
description.schinese: 在铁梯赛中，当对手在梯子上时，推倒梯子使其坠落
description.spanish: Empuja una escalera para tirar de ella a un rival en un Ladder Match.
description.tchinese: 在鐵梯賽中推倒對手所在的梯子將其擊倒
